com.actinarium.rhythm

Class AbstractSpecLayerGroup<T extends AbstractSpecLayerGroup>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.actinarium.rhythm.AbstractSpecLayerGroup<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RhythmSpecLayer, RhythmSpecLayerParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Columns, Inset, RhythmOverlay

    public abstract class AbstractSpecLayerGroup<T extends AbstractSpecLayerGroup>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RhythmSpecLayerParent
    An abstract base class with common functionality for Rhythm overlay layers that have sub-layers

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 android.graphics.Rect drawableBounds)
        Description copied from interface: RhythmSpecLayer
        Draw itself to the provided canvas within provided bounds according to internal configuration (if any)
        Specified by:
        draw in interface RhythmSpecLayer
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas for the layer to draw itself to
        drawableBounds - Bounds where this layer should draw itself. Since these are the bounds of a RhythmDrawable connected to the view, they are usually the same as the view’s bounds, so you can use this parameter to get the view’s dimensions should you need them.

      • addLayer

        public T addLayer(RhythmSpecLayer layer)
        Add a spec layer to this group. Note: by default, calling this method DOESN'T trigger redraw. If you are calling this when overlay is already displayed and want to have changes displayed immediately, you also must call View.invalidateDrawable(Drawable) or similar yourself.
        Specified by:
        addLayer in interface RhythmSpecLayerParent
        Parameters:
        layer - A Rhythm spec layer
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • size

        public int size()
        Return the number of children in this layer group
        Returns:
        number of children
